div.p: FI conceived the idea. FI, and SB designed the experiment; FI and SB conducted the fieldwork. FI lead the laboratory experiments; FI analysed the data and wrote the manuscript, and SB reviewed the manuscript. Both authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.p: This study was funded by Wellcome Trust/DBT India Alliance Fellowship (IA/I(S)/12/2/500629) to FI, and the Athena Fund at the Cornell Lab of Ornithology and the Explorer’s Club Exploration Fund to SB. The field experiments comply with the current laws of the India where the study was performed. We thank Uttarakhand Forest Department for ethical approval and permission for the collection of avian blood samples. We thank numerous research assistants who helped us during the fieldwork. We thank H. Maithani, M. Rao, P. Jeganathan and C. Bowden for help with fieldwork and K. Narayanan, P. Dey for help with lab work. We also thank Dr. Staffan Bensch, the editor and two anonymous reviewers for constructive comments that improved the manuscript.
The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.div: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: The field experiments comply with the current laws of the India where the study was performed. We thank Uttarakhand Forest Department for ethical approval and permission for the collection of avian blood samples.

This study was funded by Wellcome Trust/DBT India Alliance Fellowship (IA/I(S)/12/2/500629) to FI, and the Athena Fund at the Cornell Lab of Ornithology and the Explorer’s Club Exploration Fund to SB.
Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
